# Monte Carlo integration
  
Can integrate functions....

# Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("stephaneguerrier/demo")
```

# What it does

```{r}
library(inclassdemo)
obj = mc_int(x_range = c(0,1), fun = "x^3", B = 10^5)
plot(obj)
```
